name: Edwin D. KOHR, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Kohr v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Edwin D. KOHR, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
Jurisdiction relinquished.
Justice FITZGERALD notes his dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
934 A.2d 691
Edwin D. KOHR, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 22, 2007.
